title: Marouane Chamakh
summary: Marouane Chamakh (French: [maʁwan ʃamak]; Arabic: مروان الشماخ‎; born 10 January 1984) is a former professional footballer who played as a forward. He is described as a prototypical target man and is noted for his "link-up play", "tall stature" and "excellent heading ability".[3][4] Chamakh is also Bordeaux’s eighth highest goalscorer of all-time.[5]
